answers.answer: Are you propping them up as often as you are on them? Or tried using a warm wash cloth wrapped around them?
they just got swollen out of nowhere ! I've been keeping them propped up but they are crazy swollen it looks crazy
Part of it can be normal and part if it could mean preeclampsia so I'd mention to your Dr at your next appointment but don't stress too much. :)

How far along are you? I was pretty swollen my 2nd pregnancy but the night before I went into labor I was seriously extra swollen. But if it's out of nowhere let your Dr know asap.preeclampsia is no joke.

I have swelling also.My doctor said its normal.What isnt normal is if your hands, feet, face all get swollen you get blurry vision and a bad headache she said that is preeclampsia.Mine got so swollen my husband said I had muffin top over my shoes lmao I couldn't stop laughing it scared me though cuz I never had it.For the swelling my doctor said prop my feet up preferably above my hips.drink alot of water.I think this sounds funny but I read to put cabbage leaves on the swelling.  I haven't yried it yet but curious to see if it works.

question: My ankles are sooooo swollen when should I be concerned ?
title: swelling!?!
